remarks: Closure of the power series multiplication operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
psrmulcl.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrmulcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrmulcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` S ) $.
psrmulcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
psrmulcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psrmulcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
psrmulcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) $.
